author: prebello
body:
This PR aims to:
1) update relval matrix with newest GENSIM strings (from 10_0_0_pre2)
2) update sample SinglePiE50HCAL with high statistics (default configuration)
3) change 2018PU samples to average 50

All changes already tested OK in the 10_0_0_pre2 release.

@fabozzi
title: matrix update new GENSIM and change 2018 PU to AVE_50
